current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to include
		  contracts and grants for residential care for veterans in the exception to the
		  requirement that the Federal Government recover a portion of the value of
		  certain projects.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 8136(b)
			 of title 38, United States Code

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
of a contract or grant for residential care for
			 veterans,

header.#text:
Inclusion of contracts and
			 grants for residential care for veterans in exception to certain recapture
			 requirements

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S1540 IS: To amend title 38, United States Code, to include contracts and grants for residential care for veterans in the exception to the requirement that the Federal Government recover a portion of the value of certain projects.
